Package model.infiniteodysseys

Class IOCharacter

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.infiniteodysseys.IOCharacter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Character 
    public final class IOCharacter
extends java.lang.Object
implements Character
    An implementation of the Character interface. This class represents an Infinite Odyssey's character, which has a Strength, Intelligence, Creativity, Charisma, Stealth, and Intimidation stat.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      IOCharacter​(int str, int intel, int cre, int cha, int ste, int intim)

      Constructs a new IOCharacter with the given integers.

      Returns the value of this Character's defense.

      Returns the current health points this Character has.

    • Constructor Detail

      • IOCharacter

        public IOCharacter​(java.lang.String name,
                   java.lang.String playerName,
                   IORoles role,
                   java.lang.String roleSpecification,
                   int str,
                   int intel,
                   int cre,
                   int cha,
                   int ste,
                   int intim)
            throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Constructs a new IOCharacter with the given integers.
        Parameters:
        name - character's name
        playerName - the name of the character who's playing
        role - the role of the character
        roleSpecification - the specification of the character's role
        str - character strength
        intel - character intelligence
        cre - character creativity
        cha - character charisma
        ste - character stealth
        intim - character intimidation
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if any of the given integers are negative OR if they add up to a value greater than 30 OR if any of the given Strings are null OR if the name or playerName is whitespace OR if the IORoles is null

      • setHP

        public void setHP​(int hp)
        Description copied from interface: Character
        Sets the value of this Character's hp to the given integer. If the integer is less than 0, the hp will be set to 0. If the integer is greater than the Character's max hp.
        Specified by:
        setHP in interface Character
        Parameters:
        hp - the new hp value
